title: 22 "Love Me or Hate Me" How to Stop Caring What Other People Think
itunes:title: Ep. 22 "Love Me or Hate Me" How to Stop Caring What Other People Think
description:
Hey Girl Hey!

 

This episode is all about getting to the ROOT of 1. Why we care what other people think about us 2. What exactly it looks like in our minds when we panic and worry about what others say about us and 3. Some tips and tricks to start letting go of that mentality TODAY.

 

Head on over here to my website (www.beatricekamau.com if the link is not clickable for you) to get your FREE downloadable PDF guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think.

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
